Adventure + end lvls
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 4 Archive (PS2): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here) : Adventure + end lvls
By At the comp. on Saturday, June 24, 2006 - 08:54 pm:

I never knew this before but at the end of the + dungeons, you fight a harder version of the boss. Do you get anything for beating them besides Xp.

By Petit-Trot on Sunday, June 25, 2006 - 07:32 am:

Yes.

By Scorpio Maurus on Friday, July 28, 2006 - 04:03 am:

You can obtain some pretty cool items Besides Rainbow Stones too. I got 18 Rainbow stones in 2 days in the process of trying to find Flazer. Here are some of the Items they yield for you. Togle / Wise Earrings. Kalaragi/ Power Armband. Promiass / Love Necklace. Kawrea / Courage Belt. To my knowledge once you gain those pretty much everything they give you is either Rainbow Stones or some expensive Items such as Mocchi Scream Painting or Amethyst and such. The four Items mentioned increase you Adventure Points so that you can explore longer.

By Scorpio Maurus on Friday, July 28, 2006 - 04:13 am:

Ooops P.S. a Monster with MAX adventure Level and all four of these Items can have over 6,000 Advneture Points all by itself. I have also found that by raising only one monster at a time from the very beginning and never ever having two means there will be no counter attacks. Appearantly Philia doesn't show up unless you have 2 monsters. So no counters also makes finding Rainbow stones easier.
